title: Need a gift for an Apple lover? Pick up the ZeroLemon MagJuice+ for under $50!
content:
Macworld

Got an Apple fan on your gift list? Then the ZeroLemon MagJuice+ is going to be perfect for them. And since you can now get it under $50, it’ll hardly dent your Christmas budget. Just order by December 7 so it arrives by the holiday!

The ZeroLemon MagJuice+ is a 10,000mAh wireless battery pack designed for use with iPhones, Apple Watches, and AirPods. Its built-in magnet securely attaches to your devices without interrupting charging, and its battery capacity can offer one full charge for up to three devices, allowing users to give their precious Apple gear a power boost whenever their batteries run low. 

It also has a foldable kickstand that’s fully adjustable, providing a customizable viewing angle and comfortable charging experience. Meanwhile, the ZeroLemon’s fast cable charging enables the power bank to recharge with a 20W PD adapter in about 3.5 hours, while charging pass-through support means users can charge their Apple devices while the battery pack is charging.

While the ZeroLemon is compatible with most Apple devices, it cannot magnetically or wirelessly charge the iPhone 12 mini or 13 Mini. All other iPhone models are compatible.

Treat an Apple lover to an accessory they’ll use every day.

Grab the ZeroLemon MagJuice+ for just $45.99 through December 17 at 11:59 p.m. Pacific. Order on or before December 7 at 11:59 p.m. Pacific to ensure it arrives by Christmas!
